update AFC_WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_BIND_FLOW
FLOW_STATE = #{flowState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICANT_ID = #{applicantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPLY_TIME = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APPLICANT_IP = #{applicantIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REVIEWER_ID = #{reviewerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REVIEW_TIME = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REVIEWER_IP = #{reviewerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WITHDRAW_TYPE = #{withdrawType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CONTACT_TEL = #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ACCOUNT_NO = #{bankAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{bankAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_ACCOUNT_BANK = #{openAccountBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update AFC_WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_BIND_FLOW set FLOW_STATE = #{flowState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLICANT_ID = #{applicantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPLY_TIME = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APPLICANT_IP = #{applicantIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEWER_ID = #{reviewerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REVIEW_TIME = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REVIEWER_IP = #{reviewerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WITHDRAW_TYPE = #{withdrawType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CONTACT_TEL = #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_ACCOUNT_NO = #{bankAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{bankAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_ACCOUNT_BANK = #{openAccountBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, FLOW_STATE, REJECT_REASON, APPLICANT_ID, APPLY_TIME, APPLICANT_IP, REVIEWER_ID, REVIEW_TIME, REVIEWER_IP, ACCOUNT_ID, WITHDRAW_TYPE, CONTACT_TEL, BANK_ACCOUNT_NO, BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, OPEN_ACCOUNT_BANK, IP, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP from AFC_WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_BIND_FLOW

select
from AFC_WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_BIND_FLOW where APPLICANT_ID = #{applicantId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by APPLY_TIME desc limit 1
mapper.update: update AFC_WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_BIND_FLOW SET FLOW_STATE = #{flowState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEWER_ID = #{reviewerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REVIEW_TIME = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REVIEWER_IP = #{reviewerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and FLOW_STATE=1
